desc: PMBIA Certified adult and kids mountain bike instruction and courses in Ottawa-Gatineau. Sign up to get notified of courses, private lessons, group clinics and women's only sessions. Book now !

layout.text:
Our course calendar will be updated shortly with more of the courses you are asking for. (yes more jumps and drops)
Email us with questions or private lesson requests.
